item.title: OKRs Revisited: A Turning Point in Our Planning Process
item.description: Reflecting on our annual planning, we found OKRs deeply align actions with values. This method involves setting aspirational objectives, tracking progress with leading indicators, and engaging in regular reviews, directed with experimentations and clarity in our personal and professional lives.
item.dc:creator: Matt Lebrun
